attributes.action:
MPs hold local vote. 
Leave no deal
Leave with government deal
2nd referendum
attributes.background: MP’s are not doing what was asked of them. They are doing what they think the people want. But with the country divided how can they hear everyone’s voice. We voted to leave. They are not leaving they are remaining but in such a way the people will suffer.They are power grabbing. Not listening to us

rejection.details:
We can't accept your petition because we are not sure what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take.

You could start a new petition setting out clearly what action you would like the UK Government or Parliament to take. You may also want to sign this petition if it's something you would like to see happen:

https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/233063
